examples.example: 我今天去加油站加了一加仑的汽油，然后开心地去旅行了。

translate.english: I went to the gas station to add one gallon of gasoline today, and then happily went on a trip.

examples.example: 我用一加仑的颜料绘制出了一幅美丽的画卷。

translate.english: I used one gallon of paint to draw a beautiful picture scroll.

examples.example: 我买了一加仑的牛奶，准备和家人一起分享这份营养与美味。

translate.english: I bought a gallon of milk and am ready to share this nutrition and deliciousness with my family.
